name: Universe 211-H
description:
Welcome to Universe 211-H, a game about balancing the stats of a planet!

In short, there are four stats: Population, Environment, Food, and Water.  At the beginning of each round, you'll be given five randomised cards. Each card does different things to different stats and for different amounts of time. Try your best to keep your universe balanced, or there could be horrible consequences...

Known bugs/issues:

Windows and Mac: Game file named 'GameJam1' instead of 'Universe 211-H'

Mac: Music cutting out, no sound effects, squashed-looking screens

Credits:

Programming: Anna (annAleigh_games)

Music: James (jFrederino)

Sound effects: Ave (ave) 

Art: Anna, Ave, James

Being super duper cool and helping Anna learn how to code ("Advisor"): Dr. Hamlin (grubling)
